about_the_game:
A phantom raiding fleet, elusive and relentless, continues to harass the routes of Ursa Major and nearby star regions. Not only cargo vessels but even fleets en route to rescue missions suffer dire consequences. The routes of Liberal to Konzern and Transcendent are almost impossible to maintain.\nWe must delve into the masterminds behind these attacks. Now, advancing toward the origin of the events, we must contact and annihilate the trouble concealed in the Spectre Abyss.


This DLC includes the new "Ghost Fleet" storyline, battles, ships, components, and commander.
detailed_description:
A phantom raiding fleet, elusive and relentless, continues to harass the routes of Ursa Major and nearby star regions. Not only cargo vessels but even fleets en route to rescue missions suffer dire consequences. The routes of Liberal to Konzern and Transcendent are almost impossible to maintain.\nWe must delve into the masterminds behind these attacks. Now, advancing toward the origin of the events, we must contact and annihilate the trouble concealed in the Spectre Abyss.


This DLC includes the new "Ghost Fleet" storyline, battles, ships, components, and commander.
name: Ghost Fleet 幽灵舰队
short_description: In the long-forgotten ruins of a star system, shadows reemerge. Gazing upon their homeworld, devastated by AI, the flames of vengeance blaze within them. Emerging from the Spectre Abyss connected to the dwarf galaxy Fornax, they swarm forth, vowing to annihilate all AI civilizations.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
